price: Sεdeε wͻ’beyi deε Yε’de ama wͻn no ho boniayε, na wͻn agye wͻn ani. Ԑnkyε koraa wͻ’behunu.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُواْۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamattaʿū fasawfa yaʿlamūna
